cause.description:
Erica loves the beach, yet she hasn't been there in over a year! Isn't that destitute???!!! She deserves a tropical island vacation. Please. Give to Erica's Tropical Vacation. Do it for the children! They need you!
1. Fun
2. Sun
3. Water
cause.mission: raise money for my tropical vacation
cause.name: Erica's Tropical Vacation Initiative
